Text: Please seed this and TBC = The Burning Crusade for WOW

I'll give the uploader the benefit of the doubt for now, Thanks for uploading! :)

Just so everyone knows it will open a WinRaR installer called Titan Quest By Duxa which was the last file assembled before this it just never got renamed and also it is a .nrg image.

I just finished the WoW_BC_ByDuxa.part1.exe torrent. Right-clicking "Open with WinRAR" on the file confirms it is a valid WinRAR self-extracting, and the Title is set to "Titan Quest By Duxa" (oops).

To be safe, I still used my own WinRAR to extract it, which eventually stopped to ask for Part 2. Will post again once I have all the parts.

Works great! Thank!

Extracted all 5 files using WinRAR. Mounted the single image using DAEMON Tools. Installed this enUS 2.0.0 expansion on my enUS 2.0.5 WoW with no problems. Patched back up to 2.0.3 then to 2.0.5 and it's playing fine.
Yeah I just extracted it from one of the other parts instead of using the self extractor to be safe. Works perfectly fine, Thank you!
Just finished downloading and extracted using (*gulp) the .exe self-extractor.  Burned the image to DVD using MagicIso and installed.  No problems whatsoever.  Thanks --
